content: c r a f t y b r a a m www liesbraam com craftybraam@gmail com craftybraam toy shoes about 6cm from heel to toe you will need some reasonable understanding of knitting terms because i m not able to provide any additional help you re on your own here needed small amounts of dk or sport yarn knitting needle 2 5mm crochet hook 2 25mm knit k=knit p=purl *=make1 k on rs p on ws 2tog=2stitches together 2togtbl=2stitches together through back stitches loop ssk=slip-slip-knit yo=yarn over rs=right side ws=wrong side crochet chain=chain single_crochet=single_crochet slip_stitch=slipstitch start with sole same for every style cast on 14 odd # row = ws 1 p14 even # row = rs 2 k2*k1*k3*k2*k3*k1*k2 20 purl ridge method 3 p20 4 k2*k1*k5*k1*k2*k1*k5*k1*k2 28 5 p28 6 k2*k1*k8*k1*k1*k2*k1*k1*k8*k1*k2 38 7 k38 8 p38 change colour if desired alternative crochet method alternative method row 8 to get a crocheted chain above the sole of the shoe take 1st stitch off needle with crochet hook and then insert hook between next 2 stitches pull up yarn to crochet a slip_stitch repeat till the end put stitch back on the needle 38 9-15 p38 on ws k38 on rs add pattern if desired lacey colour work etc 7 row total 16 k11 k2tog 8x k11 30 17 p30 shoe with strap or tie 18 cast off crochet strap chain 15 starting in 6th chain from hook =button hole single_crochet 10 back to starting stitch sew a strap on opposite side of each shoe add button crochet ribbon chain 25-30 on both sides of each shoe to tie into bow shoe with t-bar 18 cast off 11 knit 8 cast off 11 8 - cut yarn and continue with the 8 stitches on rs 19 rs ssk k1 k2tog k1 k2tog 5 20-22 p5 on ws k5 on rs p5 on ws 23 ssk k1 k2tog 3 24 cast off in purl crochet strap see above and attach the t-bar in the middle shoe with lace 18 k6 k2tog yo k2tog yo k1 k2tog 4x k1 yo k2tog yo k2tog k6 26 19 p11 p2tog 2x p11 24 cast off crochet ch60 to weave through eyelets ankle boot with or without tie 18 k11 k2tog 4x k11 26 19 p11 p2tog 2x p11 24 20 k11 k2tog k11 23 change colour when starting this row if you want contrast 21 k23 for top row 2 different options k 3 row 2nd row k2tog yo if you want eyelets for ribbon 7 row reverse stocking stitch or k1-p1 ribbing for a fold over edge cast off in pattern if needed crochet ch60 to weave through eyelets finishing sew the back and bottom of the shoe weave in all loose ends add buttons flowers or any fun decorations © liesbeth m braam 1
